title: Inside the Generator, Space Whale, & da Vinci’s Mind
author: John "Halcyon" Styn
content:
I spent the last week working on the Dream Swing at The Generator in Sparks, NV.   This place is amazing. (Check out this blog post by Affinity to learn more about it.)

During breaks from our project, I’ve been able to meet a number of amazing artists and admire their creative processes.

Want to get a feel for what the vibe is like at the Generator as Burners are preparing for BRC 2016? Check out the archives of these scrappy live broadcasts:

Talking with Colin O’Bryan and Phoenix of “Inside the Mind of Da Vinci”
“I’m looking for a Master – who is actually producing something that I admire…and that’s who I build with… and that’s what I consider collaboration.”

Interview with Kesley about “The Space Whale”
“It starts with a dream…a whale as the perfect ambassador…”

Interview with Lindsay of The Generator
“I’m the MacGuyver…I’m the one that comes up with solutions…”

Me helping with the Pink Heart Dream Swing (co-hosted by 8 year old Kam):
“I am still a little limited with my skills…”

I’m so grateful to everyone involved in The Generator. I can’t wait to see your projects come alive in the dust!
